text: The 2016–17 season will be Anorthosis' 68th consecutive season in the Cypriot First Division, the top division of Cyprus football. It covers a period from 1 July 2016 to 30 May 2017. ==Season overview== ===Transfer activity=== Anorthosis Famagusta commenced their summer transfer activity on 3 June, by signing Serbian football player Milan Savić from Novi Pazar for 1+2 years.Συμφωνία με Μίλαν Σάβιτς, Anorthosis Famagusta Official Website On 17 June, Anorthosis announced the signing of Spanish footballers Cristóbal Márquez Crespo from CD Toledo for 1+1 years.Κατ’ αρχήν συμφωνία με Cristóbal Márquez Crespo, Anorthosis Famagusta Official Website and Alberto Aguilar Leiva from Western Sydney Wanderers for a year.Κατ’ αρχήν συμφωνία με Alberto Aguilar Leiva, Anorthosis Famagusta Official Website ==Players== ==Transfers== ===In=== Total spending: €130,000 ===Out=== Total Income: €900,000 Extra Income: €300,000 (Giorgi Aburjania resale to Sevilla) €100,000 (Dino Ndlovu appearance of Qarabağ FK in UEFA Europa League) Net income: €1,170,000 ==Pre-season friendlies== ==Season 2016-17== ==Cyprus Cup 2016-17== ==Squad
